message.body: Do you have a parking spot available for tomorrow? Probably getting there around noon.
Yep
Can I reserve one of the spots?
Sure thing. See you around noon?
Either me, Sam, or my wife, Kathy, will be home.
Great. I have a silver Explorer. I see the spots are listed in 2 places on Craigslist, one for $30 and one for $50. What are you asking?
$30 is fine
Guarantee me the spot and I'll pay you $40. I wouldn't want to get there and the spot is taken and I have to go back to the parking area and take a shuttle. I'll pay a bit extra to guarantee it.
Guaranteed. Not a problem.
Thanks....much appreciated!
What's your name?
Steve Sullivan. I was gonna say Charlie Manuel but that might not have saved the spot for me!
Haha, see you tomorrow Steve!
Thanks. What's your name and am I parking at 2810?
Thanks again...see ya tomorrow
Steve - you'll be parking in 2812 driveway right next to mine.
Okay in picking up my neighbor now and we'll be on our way. What's the best route to take?
Sounds good we'll figure it out
If you're from the north taking 476 south, I presume the same would work!
I'd do my best to stay off rt 30/Lancaster ave.
